name: frozen dirt
description:
current issues, hopefully resolved soon

  • high score not recording
  • fullscreen seems to run slow, sometimes? sdfdfdfd
  • weird bugs
  • a weird bug
  • this weird bug when you die you get more power
  • cool bug when you die the bomber keeps on bombering

another god damn repetitive bug-filled short bullet hell with poor balancing made under extreme pressure by trevor boddy very slowly over about a week for cirno game jam sept. 2019 with the aid of: 12oz coffee grounds / ~50 beers / ~2oz of pot

as usual i tend to disregard the theme as much as possible. so enjoy a cirno sprite from CTC and a crappy static sunny milk one that i made.

bomb extend after every boss
life extend after 3rd boss

arrow keys: move
z: shoot
shift: focus
x: bomb
esc: pause
r: return to title

joystick: move
b1: shoot
b2: bomb
b3: focus
b5: pause
b6: return to title

all programming and design by trevor boddy
all graphics except cirno sprite also by trevor boddy
cirno sprite CCbync4 by github/danmaq
music & sfx by habs (made for previous touhou game jam) used with permission
and of course characters by ZUN

special thanks to: everybody on the incredible touhou gamedev hub discord server, habs, frank monaghan.

ok i'm done remaking the same game over and over i swear
